alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Erath; Hood; Palo Pinto; Parker; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 4:22AM CDT until March 24 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Somervell County in north central Texas... Erath County in north central Texas... Parker County in north central Texas... Southern Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... Hood County in north central Texas... Northeastern Comanche County in central Texas... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 421 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Palo Pinto to near Dublin, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Stephenville, Mineral Wells, Granbury, Dublin, Pecan Plantation, Willow Park, Springtown, Glen Rose, Brock, Hudson Oaks, Western Lake, Annetta, Gordon, Lipan, Palo Pinto, Cool, Dinosaur Valley State Park, Lake Weatherford and Squaw Creek Reservoir. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 364 and 417. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Comanche; Erath; Hood; Palo Pinto; Parker; Somervell
